attributes.action: scrap the planned employment of Government Officials to invade the privacy of our homes, using cameras and other recording methods to reassess our properties for Council Tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that having bought our homes over many years we have the right to privacy within those homes, and the fact that we may have improved them, and maintain them should not be held against us or provide the Government with additional taxation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
